skillTree.localised_description: This one’s writhing form can slowly caress and tease, but also move like lightning when required, knocking a projectile from the air or batting it back at the foe.
As the Perfect Prince's dark influence increases, so too do the blessings of His pleasure.
This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.
The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: Beneath flax-fine hair and a crown of lacquered horns sit eyes full of innocence; and yet they are cruel, calculating and without pity.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Phantasmagoria Upgraded"

skillTree.localised_description: To supplicate the Damned Prince is not only to worship him, but to follow in his immaculate footsteps.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for embedded Heroes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Fine silks bedecked with alluring jewels of malevolent magic empower this statuesque form.
Long and delicate, Azazel’s double-headed tail suspends with graceful movements, belying its potential to lacerate with extreme violence.

“…From the day You were Chosen
	All wrongdoing found You,
	Filled with lawlessness and sin,
	Yet perfect in Your ways…”
One cannot experience the greatest pleasures without first experiencing the greatest pains.

effects.description:
Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to upgrade characters to a Daemon Prince of Slaanesh
	(all characters)

Path to Glory: -25% Souls cost to devote to Slaanesh
	(all characters)

skillTree.localised_description: Swift flashes of an agile form and razor-sharp blades are all this Daemon Lord's victims see of him, but by then it's already far, far too late.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith can rival reaving the souls of the slain; a dark and twisted offering in honour of the Ruinous Powers.

skillTree.localised_description: Few could resist such sultry wiles, drawing so many to corruption's insidious grasp.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
Entities with this attribute double their charge bonus when attacking the rear or flank of an entity.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

A unit with the Mark of Slaanesh has:
	➕  Immune to Psychology Attribute
	➕  Strider Attribute
	➕ Increased  Physical Resistance
	 ➕ Increased  Speed
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

factionEffects.localised_description: Azazel sees into the very hearts and souls of mortal men, their deepest desires and hidden passions laid bare under his enchanting gaze.

effects.description: Maximum active gifts: +1 for Gifts of Slaanesh
Diplomatic relations: +80 with Empire, Kislev, Cathay and Bretonnia
Vassals gain "Immune to Psychology" and spread Slaanesh corruption
Applies and benefits from Seductive Influence and Gifts of Slaanesh

items.colour_text: Fashioned by Slaanesh himself, Azazel's devilish sword strikes with a hellish force that even enchanted armour simply cannot deflect.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: From a warm, silvery voice comes whispers telling the foe of pleasures that could be theirs, if only they submit to the waiting arms of Slaanesh.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases by each enemy unit in range with leadership wavering or lower.

effects.description: Seduce Units cost: -20% for Empire, Bretonnia, Kislev and Cathay units
